about_the_game:
Cosmorbit is a minimalistic puzzle game where you click on celestial bodies to make them disappear.

The rules are simple. Celestial bodies without any orbiting bodies can be clicked and removed.

Clear the stage by removing the central celestial body last.

There are no head-scratching difficulties. Enjoy it as a way to unwind.

Features of Cosmorbit

  • Simple rules that can be understood immediately

  • Relaxing music and sound effects

  • A variety of stages and additional modes after clearing

  • Dark mode support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 (64-bit) / Windows 8.1 (64-bit) / Windows 10 (64-bit) / Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel or AMD CPU
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Cosmorbit is a minimalistic celestial puzzle game. With simple controls, just click on the celestial bodies. It's not complicated. Relax and enjoy.
